DOC.brief_summary: Renal hypoxia play important role development contrast-induced nephropathy . The purpose PRINCIPLE study investigate effect pretreatment intravenous nicorandil incidence contrast-induced nephropathy patient renal insufficiency undergo coronary angiography .
DOC.brief_title: Preventive Effect PRetreatment With Intravenous Nicorandil Contrast-Induced Nephropathy Patients With RenaL Dysfunction UndEergoing Coronary Angiography ( PRINCIPLE Study )
DOC.criteria: Patients age ≥ 20 year Patients undergo elective coronary angiogram due document myocardial ischemia symptom angina Estimated Cr clearance ≤60 mL/min CockcroftGault formula serum Cr ≥1.1 mg/dL Signed write informed consent participate study Acute myocardial infarction require primary rescue coronary intervention Allergic reaction contrast dye nicorandil Cardiogenic shock significant hypotension Previous use nicorandil within precede 7 day Exposure contrast medium within precede 7 day Pregnancy woman age childbearing potential Heart failure ( NYHA class III IV ; LV ejection fraction < 40 % echocardiogram ) Acute renal failure chronic dialysis Mechanical ventilation History kidney transplantation Life expectation le 6 month Previous renal artery angioplasty within last 6 month Use nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug , intravenous use diuretic , dopamine , mannitol , Nacetylcysteine , ascorbic acid sodium bicarbonate within 48 hrs procedure Severe liver disease
DOC.keyword: Patients chronic renal failure undergo coronary angiography
